projects: [{"title":"Assistive device for people suffering from Alzheimer's disease","start_date":"Apr 2015","description":"A 3-device system, including a wearable device for the patient suffering from Alzheimer's disease, a range extender cum assistive device (which can be attached to any mobile phone) for the caregiver and an Android app for assisting the caregiver."},{},{},{"title":"Audio Support System for Speech Impaired People","start_date":"Aug 2014","end_date":"Apr 2015","description":"An embedded system to provide limited audio support for Speech impaired person"},{},{},{}]
